20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Duwaid bin Nafi' said:" Ibn Shihab informed me, saying: 'Ata bin Yazid narrated to me from Abu Ayyub: That the Prophet (ﷺ) said: 'Witr is a duty, and whoever wants to pray witr with seven (rak'ahs), let him do so; whoever wants to pray witr with five, let him do so, whoever wants to pray witr with three, let him do so; and whoever wants to pray witr with one, let him do so

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى الزُّهْرِيِّ فِي حَدِيثِ أَبِي أَيُّوبَ فِي الْوَتْرِ . د }
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the different narrations from Az-Zuhri, for the hadith of Abu Ayyub concerning Witr
